title: Ping from New Zealand to server?
body: Moving to new zealand next week and just wondering what my ping will be. ill be moving to dunedin otago. :)

replies.body:
thank you ^^ that would be an amazing improvement from what i've been getting from NA and LAN (originall from canada but moved to south america) been playing with 100-120 (LAN) and 180-220 (NA) for years xD 60 would be amazing

JLP, may i ask what your ping to NA is? i might still want to play on NA @ times with friends
I get 35 ping where I am, but that's in Tauranga, not sure what it would be like in dunedin
